LoaderTypeRedirect< T > Struct Template Reference

Template class that allows us to use a default argument in the forward declaration of the ItemComboTable event though the type VALUE_TYPE is not defined yet. More...

#include <ItemComboTableFwd.h>

List of all members.

Public Types

  • typedef T loaderType

Detailed Description

template<class T>
struct LoaderTypeRedirect< T >

Template class that allows us to use a default argument in the forward declaration of the ItemComboTable event though the type VALUE_TYPE is not defined yet.

Instances of the ItemComboTable template use the LoaderTypeRedirect::loaderType type internally.
